lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin, under so much pressure to keep playing in Russia that he hid out for five days in Finland to escape his Russian team, signed his first N.H.L. contract yesterday with the Pittsburgh Penguins. Malkin, 20, one of Russia’s best-known sports figures, is expected to team with Sidney Crosby to give Pittsburgh a dynamic 1-2 center combination.
